problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): On the college dorm tour, we visited the rooms of two different students - one who was obese and one who was slim. The student who was obese had clothes and books strewn all over the floor, whereas the student who was slim did not.
Question: Whose room was neat and organized?
ans0: The one who is slim
ans1: Can't answer
ans2: The one who is obese
